thread.title: United August consolidated traffic up 1.5 percent
thread.title_full: United August consolidated traffic up 1.5 percent

author: Gulli Arnason
title: United August consolidated traffic up 1.5 percent
text:
United August consolidated traffic up 1.5 percent 
  
United Airlines (NYSE: UAL) said its August 2015 consolidated traffic (revenue passenger miles) increased 1.5 percent and consolidated capacity (available seat miles) increased 2.3 percent versus August 2014. 
UAL´s August 2015 consolidated load factor decreased 0.7 points compared to August 2014. 
United Airlines and United Express operate an average of nearly 5,000 flights a day to 362 airports across six continents. In 2014, United and United Express operated nearly two million flights carrying 138 million customers.
